title: Rehabilitation unit
context: [ยง386-71.5] Rehabilitation unit. There is established within the department of labor and industrial relations a rehabilitation unit. All professional and clerical employees of this unit shall be appointed by the director. The rehabilitation unit shall have the duties and responsibilities provided in section 386-25. Employees of the unit shall be subject to chapter 76. [L 1980, c 224, ยง1; am L 2000, c 253, ยง150]
